"Zeno":
"Thanks, <%me>.
That was a nice change of pace."

"You know, it's kind of crazy when I think of
how many times my mentor's advice has
saved my hide."

"I've never figured out how much of it was
tailored to me specifically, and how much

"Anyway, when you're ready for your reward,
come and find me at my usual spot."
